topics.author: 511c09ec7f123b35980001eb

topics.body:
Speaking of Black Friday I was talking to my Mom and sis about how stupid it is people loose there Fucking Humanity over shit _*that's not even free*_ cuz they _*still have to pay for it*_.

I could see if EVERYTHING IS FREE ON BLACK FRIDAY, but no everything is _only_ on sale and that's it.

Its the most pointless thing ever I swear. and its even more dumb to know that _people would literally kill someone for something they still have to pay fucking money for._

I mean yeah its cool and nice that things are on sale but holy crap don't hurt people and GO NUTS about it.
